text:
From HTTPSession:
===
/**
     * Returns a string containing the unique identifier assigned to this
     * session. The identifier is assigned by the servlet container and is
     * implementation dependent.
     *
     * @return a string specifying the identifier assigned to this session
     *
     * @exception IllegalStateException if this method is called on an
     * invalidated session
     */
    public String getId();
===

There are no tests in org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSessionFacade or
org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession if the session is valid or not.

This could be easily fix by adding th following code to StandardSession.getID():
==
if (!isValid())
            throw new IllegalStateException
                (sm.getString("standardSession.isNew.ise"));
===
creator: matthias.berndt@gdmcom.de
